page.title: 02B.P.OIL TERMINAL
page.content: A visit was made to the B.P.oil terminal in Hardwicke. We were met at reception and went to see Mr. Elcote,the shift manager. He then took us into his office and this is what he told us. The depot opened in 1960 which is 25 years ago. The depot's work force contains 36 men. There are also 36 tanks installed here and which holds 26,000 tonnes. . To transport petrol it is cheaper by road than by boat and that is why the depot is closing down. On long journeys 5 or 6 men travel on a boat. Each boat carries 1,000 tonnes. The furthest distance the lorries go is to Exeter airport, and the shortest is Cheltenham.
